SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into oper_log (uid, orderId, incomeId, type, incomePrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update oper_log set orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, incomeId = #{incomeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incomePrice = #{incomePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, opName = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, orderId, incomeId, type, incomePrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from oper_log
